title: Is NCERT enough for the example of morphology of flowering plants for the NEET 2021? Should I study from any module? - Quora
tags: National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT)

response.answer_text: Yes , I think it's enough . U should learn 100% given in NCERT , including daigrams floral formula everything . Checking into past few years paper u will notice that it is mostly based on NCERT . U can study from modules when u feel that u are done with that of NCERT and u are confident about it . But I would recommend not to learn too many examples from other sources . This will give unnecessary stress to you . And u may forget what is of primary importance ( ie: NCERT )
Ncert is enough for the examples of morphology. The chapters you should read from module are Ecology Genetics Molecular biology Cell biology Thank you
